title: The island princess, or, The generous Portuguese made into an opera, as it is performed at the Theatre Royal / all the musical entertainments and the greatest part of the play new, and written by Mr. Motteux.
author: Motteux, Peter Anthony, 1660-1718.
publisher: Printed for Richard Wellington ... and sold by Bernard Lintott ...,
notes: Adaptation of: The island princess / John Fletcher.
Without the music (chiefly by Daniel Purcell).
Reproduction of original in Folger Library.
